Name: Fix 2 checklist
Fixtures
Employee trained for task and reviewed installation instructions (product QR code / manufacturer's website / instruction manual)
Notify and gain permit from principal contractor / client for inspection
Correct product (samples provided)
Check products for imperfections
Location & fixings (as per drawings & manufacturer guidelines)
Silicone seals are acceptable standard (as applicable)
Operation of all fixtures, taps & points of demand
Final fit off inspection on all items
Inspection date
Items protected until commissioning (Attach photos below)
Final sign off - Pass when satisfied to proceed (Any issues please comment & Add photos below)
Passing above includes Builder sign-off
Area clean
Commissioning
Employee trained for task and reviewed installation instructions (product QR code / manufacturer's website / instruction manual)
Notify and gain permit from principal contractor / client for inspection
Check products for imperfections
Fixtures location & fixings all correct (as per drawings & samples)
Clean out all strainers / aerators
Check for no cross connections / leaks / access to isolation valves
Floor wastes (clear of debris & draining correctly)
Quality of silicone seals to fixtures acceptable
Hot water tempering valve set to 50c (+/- 5c) & DDA thermostatic mixing valve set to 42 degrees.
Water pressure acceptable 350Kpa to 500 Kpa
Final sign off - Pass when satisfied to proceed (Any issues please comment & Add photos below)
Passing above includes Builder sign-off
Area clean
